# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/token.py
@source-hash: fc76ed1a1cbdb2c9
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:07:23Z

## Primary Purpose
Auto-generated Python token constants module that defines all token types used by the Python tokenizer and parser. Part of the LLDB Python environment for debugging Rust code.

## Key Components

### Token Constants (L6-77)
- **Basic tokens (L6-24)**: Core language elements - ENDMARKER, NAME, NUMBER, STRING, NEWLINE, INDENT, DEDENT, and punctuation (LPAR, RPAR, LSQB, RSQB, COLON, COMMA, etc.)
- **Operators (L14-32)**: Arithmetic and logical operators - PLUS, MINUS, STAR, SLASH, VBAR, AMPER, comparison operators
- **Compound operators (L33-53)**: Assignment operators and compound tokens - EQEQUAL, NOTEQUAL, PLUSEQUAL, DOUBLESTAR, RARROW, ELLIPSIS, COLONEQUAL
- **Special tokens (L54-77)**: Modern Python features - AT (@), AWAIT, ASYNC, f-string tokens (FSTRING_START/MIDDLE/END), TYPE_IGNORE, SOFT_KEYWORD, and parser-specific tokens

### Token Name Mapping (L79-82)
- **tok_name dict (L79-81)**: Dynamic reverse mapping from token values to names using globals() introspection
- Automatically includes all integer constants in module namespace

### Exact Token Mapping (L84-133)
- **EXACT_TOKEN_TYPES dict (L84-133)**: Maps literal string representations to token constants for precise tokenization
- Covers all Python operators, punctuation, and special sequences (e.g., '!=' → NOTEQUAL, '...' → ELLIPSIS)

### Utility Functions (L135-142)
- **ISTERMINAL(x) (L135-136)**: Checks if token is terminal (< NT_OFFSET=256)
- **ISNONTERMINAL(x) (L138-139)**: Checks if token is non-terminal (>= NT_OFFSET)
- **ISEOF(x) (L141-142)**: Checks if token is end marker

## Dependencies
- Auto-generated by Tools/build/generate_token.py (L2)
- Designed for cooperation with Python parser (L76)

## Architecture Notes
- Uses NT_OFFSET=256 to distinguish terminal vs non-terminal symbols
- Maintains backward compatibility with C tokenizer while supporting tokenize.py
- Token values are sequential integers starting from 0
- N_TOKENS=68 indicates total count of token types
